db:abstract.db:para: A collection of components for a classic desktop-style UI.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = gallery
SOURCES += \ main.cpp
RESOURCES += \ gallery.qrc
OTHER_FILES += \ main.qml \ qml/ButtonPage.qml \ qml/InputPage.qml \ qml/ProgressPage.qml \ qml/UI.js \ qml/+android/UI.js \ qml/+ios/UI.js \ qml/+osx/UI.js
include(../shared/shared.pri)
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quickcontrols/controls/gallery INSTALLS += target
